Reviews.Title: It doesn't work in Costa Rica
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: I thought that phone would work in Costa Rica, but i didn't.  I would appreciate the seller or the company who sells that phone make sure that the phone is really unlocked and it will work international.  I waste my money.

Reviews.Title: Phone at less price
Reviews.Author: Ashok Gupta
Reviews.Content: It is good in the money we are spending over it.It serves our work. No problem.Working good.In $ 35 it is workable old type phone.

Reviews.Title: not unlock
Reviews.Author: Jeanette
Reviews.Content: Its not working for GSM and its not unlocked when i get it. It sucks do not buy this product.

Reviews.Title: Works fine on ATT
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Works fine on ATT. This basic model works fine, the battery lasts for what seems like forever. At least a week on standby. The built in FM radio is a nice cheap touch.

Reviews.Title: 900/1800 PHONE! DO NOT BUY FOR U.S.!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for use in the U.S. from Rose Communications in Kentucky. The phone is listed as working on 850/1900 GSM bands i.e. U.S. compatible. The phone I received worked on 900/1800 GSM bands i.e. NOT U.S. COMPATIBLE! Beware Rose Communications and beware this phone!

Reviews.Title: Unlocked?  United Kingdom does not think so.
Reviews.Author: JRC Reno
Reviews.Content: Bought in advance of a trip to England, but several SIM chips tried upon arrival while at a "CarPhone Warehouse" by a technician (even one from his own phone) DID NOT WORK.  Was asked "Are you sure it is Unlocked?"  What could I say but that it was supposed to be....

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone will work on GSM carries like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
Unlocked Dual-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/1900MHz frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
VGA Camera, 640 x 480 pixels with video recording;Stereo FM radio;FM recording;built-in antenna;MP3/AAC player and dedicated music keys
microSD slot, up to 2GB;SMS, MMS;downloadable games;Organizer;voice memo and calendar
Talk time up to 10 hours - Standby up to 560 hs.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung E2121 Unlocked Dual-Band GSM Phone with Camera, Stereo FM Radio, MP3 Player and microSD Slot--International Version with Warranty (Black/Red)
